name: VR-Last Wish
description:
Made By Aditya and Rajat

  • Key1 - for VR View
  • Key 2- for Spectator View
  • Key 3- to go back to VR Mode while playing Car Game
  • Grab of the controller does all actions like grabbing bow and arrow and steering wheel of Kart
  • Right Controller Trigger is to Accelerate Kart
  • Left Controller Trigger is to Decelerate Kart
